snippet: Are men really ready to shop for underwear the way women do?
abstract: Market is growing for high-priced fashionable men's underwear designed with innovative fabrics, styles and colors. Photos (M)1
lead_paragraph: ARE men really ready to shop for underwear the way women do? There are plenty of examples that indicate that the market for men's unmentionables has been heading in a more fashion-conscious direction for some time, what with the popularity of the new Calvin Klein Bold collection (featuring vibrant color choices like ''limeade'' and ''splash''), rainbow-striped briefs from Diesel and -- oh, my word -- the latest snakeskin-printed waistbands from 2(x)ist. It's almost like the 1970s again, except that synthetic fabrics are now considered desirable.
